required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Absorption, Metabolism and Excretion of [14C] HQP1351 in Humans
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-center, Open-label, Single-dose Phase I Study to Investigate the Absorption, Metabolism and Excretion of [14C] HQP1351 After a Single Oral 30mg (100µCi) Dose in Healthy Chinese Male Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this study is to determine the mass balance and routes of excretion of total radioactivity after a single oral 30mg (100µCi) dose of [14C] HQP1351 given as a suspension. For further clinical development, human mass balance data are required to elucidate the absorption, metabolism, and excretion of HQP1351.

primary_outcome.measure: Radioactivity concentration of each blood and plasma sample
primary_outcome.description: Use liquid scintillation counter to evaluate Radioactivity concentration of each blood and plasma sample

primary_outcome.measure: Radioactivity concentration of each urine samples
primary_outcome.description: Use liquid scintillation counter to evaluate Radioactivity concentration of each urine sample

primary_outcome.measure: Radioactivity concentration of each feces samples
primary_outcome.description: Use liquid scintillation counter to evaluate Radioactivity concentration of each feces sample

primary_outcome.measure: Total recovery of radioactivity in urine and feces
primary_outcome.description: Calculate the total radioactivity in urine and feces based on the radioactivity concentration of each sample

secondary_outcome.description: To determine the plasma concentrations of HQP1351 with validated LC-MS/MS method for obtaining its pharmacokinetics parameters

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v5.0
secondary_outcome.description: According to CTCAE v5.0, the number and frequency of adverse events after a single dose of test drug were assessed.

arm_group.description: To investigate the absorption properties, as well as to evaluate the mass balance and elucidate the pathways of biotransformation after a single oral dose (30mg, 100µCi) of [14C] HQP1351 to healthy Chinese male subjects.

overall_official.affiliation: The First Affiliated Hospital with Nanjing Medical University

facility.name: The First Affiliated Hospital with Nanjing Medical University
